activity.title: Drag and Drop Multi
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word(s) into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: If you care about quality, then look for a <blank word="first-rate"/>   product.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Henry <blank word="would"/>   tell us the truth if he knew it.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I don’t care much about technology. In fact, <blank word="low-tech"/>   products are fine with me.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: If you <blank word="hadn’t shown"/>   me that website, I wouldn’t have known what to buy.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I guess I'll just have to <blank word="bite the bullet"/> and do it.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: No one has a collection like Katie’s. Hers is very <blank word="unique"/> .

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: That loud music is driving me <blank word="crazy"/> .

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
